code: import React from"react";import{v4 as uuidv4}from"uuid";import Highlighter from"./Highlighter";import Labeler from"./Labeler";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Builder=_ref=>{let{mode}=_ref;const uniqueId=uuidv4();if(mode==="text_highlighter"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Highlighter,{uniqueId:uniqueId});}else if(mode==="text_labeler"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Labeler,{});}else{return null;}};export default Builder;
